notification.selfroll: Roll mode set to: Self Roll
notification.publicroll: Roll mode set to: Public Roll
notification.gmroll: Roll mode set to: Private GM Roll
notification.blindroll: Roll mode set to: Blind GM Roll

notify.name: Enable notifications
notify.hint: Show a notification when the roll mode is changed using a keybind.

toggle.selfroll.name: Toggle Self Roll mode
toggle.selfroll.hint: Swap between Public and Self roll modes.
toggle.gmroll.name: Toggle Private GM Roll mode
toggle.gmroll.hint: Swap between Public and Private GM roll modes.
toggle.blindroll.name: Toggle Blind Roll mode
toggle.blindroll.hint: Swap between Public and Blind roll modes.

set.selfroll.name: Switch to Self Roll mode
set.selfroll.hint: Set the chat roll mode to Self Roll mode.
set.publicroll.name: Switch to Public Roll
set.publicroll.hint: Set the chat roll mode to Public Roll.
set.gmroll.name: Switch to Private GM Roll
set.gmroll.hint: Set the chat roll mode to Private GM Roll.
set.blindroll.name: Switch to Blind GM Roll
set.blindroll.hint: Set the chat roll mode to Blind GM Roll.
